dataflowSinks.name: UserQuerydscsvoutput
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UserQuerydscsvoutput

scriptLines: disjoint: false) ~> Software@(softwareoutput, testeroutput, functionaloutput, nodepartment)
softwareemp, TesterEmp, FunctionalEmp union(byName: true)~> AggregationofEmployee

sources.name: ds_wrangling_file1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ds_wrangling_file1

sources.name: ds_wrangling_file2
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ds_wrangling_file2
